definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: A friend of ours went to the Huashi Pharmacy, at the Portman, to purchase the inhaler she uses due to asthma.
sentences.chinese: 我们的一个朋友去华氏药店买哮喘的吸入器。

sentences.english: In America, temperature is measured on the Fahrenheit scale.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，温度是用华氏刻度来衡量的。

sentences.english: Highs will be around 77 degrees with light winds out of the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 高温会在华氏77度左右且吹轻微东北风。

sentences.english: In some countries air temperature is given in degrees of Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 在某些全国气温以华氏温标给出。

sentences.english: A 15-day heat wave raised temperatures up to 110 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 一场持续了15天的热浪使气温升高到110华氏度。

sentences.english: As soon as it gets to about 100 degrees Fahrenheit, much less foam will form.
sentences.chinese: 一旦它达到大概100华氏度，更不用说会产生奶泡。

sentences.english: Temperatures at night are approximately 10 degrees F. lower.
sentences.chinese: 夜间温度比白天约低华氏10度。

sentences.english: Before starting this polyphasic sleep experiment, I’d prefer working in a room where the temperature was 68-70 degrees F.
sentences.chinese: 从前我总是喜欢在华氏68到70度的室温下工作。

sentences.english: You should see a value in Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 您应该看到对应的华氏温度的值。

sentences.english: So temperature in Fahrenheit maybe with a space, just to get the aesthetics to look a little interesting.
sentences.chinese: 华氏温度可能用一个间隔来，使其更加美观和有趣。

sentences.english: Water freezes at 3 2 degrees Fahrenheit or 0 degrees Centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 水在华氏三十二度即摄氏零度时结冰。

sentences.english: The temperature gets high up to 110F.
Plates and stars again form near 5 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 星形盘状的也会在接近华氏5度下形成。

sentences.english: You can also select Fahrenheit or Celsius.
sentences.chinese: 您可以选择华氏温标或摄氏温标。

definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
